fontFamily: -apple-system-font,BlinkMacSystemFont, Helvetica Neue, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB , Microsoft YaHei UI , Microsoft YaHei ,Arial,sans-serif

posts.title: 内容1
posts.content:
信源：Virginia Tech News | 编译：增材制造狗


美国弗吉尼亚理工大学的图书馆正在为心理学和神经科学课程的学生，提供3D打印的大脑及神经元模型。这些精确、可触摸的物理模型，正成为一种强大的教学工具，帮助学生更直观地理解复杂的大脑结构。

对于学生而言，大脑内部复杂的三维结构，如海马体、杏仁核等，很难仅通过2D的教科书图片来理解。弗吉GINIA理工大学图书馆的创新服务，允许学生和教师根据教学需求，打印出按比例放大、甚至可以拆解的实体模型。

这种“看得见、摸得着”的互动式学习，极大地提升了学生的学习兴趣和知识掌握效率。

这个案例生动地展示了3D打印在教育领域的独特价值。它不仅仅是打印几个模型，更是将抽象的知识“实体化”，将枯燥的学习过程“游戏化”。当大学的图书馆开始成为一个“制造中心”时，这本身就是一个关于未来教育模式变革的有趣“信号”。

原始信源链接：https://news.vt.edu/articles/2025/09/Univlib-3d-brains.html

![Image 1: 3D printed parts in Color Resin V5 and True Cast Resin](https://formlabs.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fformlabs-media.formlabs.com%2Ffiler_public_thumbnails%2Ffiler_public%2F28%2Fc1%2F28c153cc-aec6-45ca-b8b1-7dfc4ec69c07%2Foptimized_for_web_jpeg-05272025_color_v5_and_true_cast_044-edit.jpg__1354x0_q85_subsampling-2.jpg&w=3840&q=75)




https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/zs1lfia1tiaJ6AhwiaFm9082XtcGrx6ctyhyxmuND2PYr8PjpHqWRyBbUK3FyaryA7vVb65NOv7gZiaM5KojD1iag6w/640?wx_fmt=png&from=appmsg&watermark=1


[谁说我没有尾巴？这是中文的显示测试。)3D printers](https://formlabs.com/3d-printers/resin/) make it possible to bring your ideas to life with intuitive, streamlined workflows. But it’s our versatile [materials library](https://formlabs.com/materials/) that

**[Color Resin V5](https://formlabs.com/store/materials/color-resin/)** 中文测试 the newest addition to our General Purpose Resins for [Form 4 Series 3D printers](https://formlabs.com/3d-printers/resin/), enabling printing of parts in **custom colors** 

Color Resin V5: Fast, Easy, and Affordable Color 3D Printing
------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 2: 3D printed parts in Color Resin V5](https://formlabs.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fformlabs-media.formlabs.com%2Ffiler_public_thumbnails%2Ffiler_public%2F5a%2Fab%2F5aab9925-7ca6-4a21-b304-6dcbccd8fb6d%2Foptimized_for_web_jpeg-formlabs_2025_color_resin_v5_003.jpg__1354x0_q85_subsampling-2.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

我建议使用推荐字号（16号），因为产业人通常年纪上来了，眼神不太好。放大点更友好。

Color Resin V5 and Form 4 Series 3D printers are rewriting timelines for producing parts in color.

While adding color to injection molded parts is easy and low-cost, timelines and minimum quantities are many times that of 3D printing. Meanwhile, [fused deposition modeling (FDM)](https://formlabs.com/blog/fdm-vs-sla-vs-sls-how-to-choose-the-right-3d-printing-technology/) filaments are available in many colors, but color-matching is difficult and part quality is lower than [stereolithography (SLA)](https://formlabs.com/blog/ultimate-guide-to-stereolithography-sla-3d-printing/) 3D printed parts.

![Image 3: 3D printed game controller prototype in Color Resin V5 next to final injection-molded controller](https://formlabs.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fformlabs-media.formlabs.com%2Ffiler_public_thumbnails%2Ffiler_public%2F11%2F79%2F1179c110-f34a-4653-8206-097ddf778a8b%2Foptimized_for_web_jpeg-formlabs_2025_color_resin_v5_005.jpg__1354x0_q85_subsampling-2.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

1. 基础设置



  {

    "isDark": false,                    // 浅色模式

    "theme": "grace",                   // 优雅主题 ✅

    "fontFamily": "Optima-Regular, Optima, PingFangSC-light, ..., serif", // 衬线字体 ✅

    "fontSize": "16px",                 // 字体大小

    "primaryColor": "#556B2F"           // 橄榄绿主题色 ✅

  }



  2. 编辑器偏好



  {

    "isEditOnLeft": true,               // 左侧编辑

    "isUseIndent": false,               // 段落首行缩进：关闭 ✅

    "isUseJustify": false,              // 段落两端对齐：关闭 ✅

    "isCiteStatus": true,               // 引用状态：开启

    "legend": "title-alt"               // 图注格式：title 优先 ✅

  }



  3. 自定义 CSS 样式



  {

    "cssContentConfig": {

      "active": "商用机器人拆解局样式",    // 当前活跃的样式

      "tabs": [

        {

          "title": "商用机器人拆解局样式",

          "name": "商用机器人拆解局样式",

          "content": "/**\n * 完整的CSS样式代码\n */\n/* 顶层容器样式 */\ncontainer {\n}\n..."

        }

      ]

    }

  }

**[Color Resin V5](https://formlabs.com/store/materials/color-resin/)** 中文测试 the newest addition to our General Purpose Resins for [Form 4 Series 3D printers](https://formlabs.com/3d-printers/resin/), enabling printing of parts in **custom colors**

------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 2: 3D printed parts in Color Resin V5](https://formlabs.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fformlabs-media.formlabs.com%2Ffiler_public_thumbnails%2Ffiler_public%2F5a%2Fab%2F5aab9925-7ca6-4a21-b304-6dcbccd8fb6d%2Foptimized_for_web_jpeg-formlabs_2025_color_resin_v5_003.jpg__1354x0_q85_subsampling-2.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

While adding color to injection molded parts is easy and low-cost, timelines and minimum quantities are many times that of 3D printing. Meanwhile, [fused deposition modeling (FDM)](https://formlabs.com/blog/fdm-vs-sla-vs-sls-how-to-choose-the-right-3d-printing-technology/) filaments are available in many colors, but color-matching is difficult and part quality is lower than [stereolithography (SLA)](https://formlabs.com/blog/ultimate-guide-to-stereolithography-sla-3d-printing/) 3D printed parts.

信源：3druck.com | 编译：增材制造狗 | 入库：2025-09-27




德国研究人员成功开发出一种基于3D打印的超材料传感器，其独特的内部结构使其能够实现高度的灵活性和灵敏度，有望在可穿戴设备和软体机器人领域带来突破。

这种传感器通过精确设计的几何结构而非材料本身来实现其传感特性。利用3D打印技术，研究人员能够制造出复杂的三维晶格结构，当这些结构受到压力或拉伸时，其电容会发生可预测的变化，从而实现对外界作用力的精确测量。

这项研究的“信号”在于，它展示了通过“结构设计”来创造“功能”的强大能力。这标志着增材制造正从单纯的形态复制，走向功能性器件的直接制造。未来，通过编程化的超材料设计，可以直接打印出具有感知、响应甚至计算能力的智能设备，极大地简化了复杂系统的集成。

原始信源链接：
https://3druck.com/en/research/3d-printed-metamaterial-sensors-to-improve-wearables-and-robotics-33149623/


null
